reviewText: Great video! Best to beginners who have never done Zumba. The video was made back in 2000 or so. But you still a great workout. I honestly like this better than the new Zumba.
This appeared to be a really low budget video. It was nothing like the Zhumba videos I've seen advertised on TV. If you want to learn Zhumba, this is not the tape for you.
It's a great workout.  The moves are just right for beginners.  It gets your heart rate up and pumping! I liked the tape a lot.

I ordered a Zumba Beginners VHS tape to use on my vcr, but received a dvd instead. I wrote to the Alpha Store site explaining the problem. It has been a couple weeks now and I have not heard anything. I have always been satisfied with my Amazon orders and am sure this can be resolved.
The tape is just what I was looking for. It is only 30 minutes long so it is easy to fit into a busy schedule. It is easy enough for a new zumba learner to grasp easily.
Overall the tape is good but the quality (as you would expect from a VHS) is not that great!  Shipper was reliable and prompt in sending the product.
This Zumba video is lots of fun~ and I know it will help shed pounds!
